001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
009
010public class NearestNeighborsPreparer implements Regime {
011
012    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
013    @Override
014    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, int step) {
015        if (!(estimationFunction instanceof NearestNeighbors nearestNeighbors)) {
016            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Only works on NearestNeighbors!");
017        }
018        nearestNeighbors.setMemory((DataSet<Float>) trainingSet);
019    }
020}
